text: Hull City's 2013–14 season is their first season back in the Premier League after finishing second in the Npower Championship last season and gaining automatic promotion. ==Results== ==References== Category:2013 in association football Category:2013 in England Category:2014 in association football Category:2014 in England Category:Football seasons Category:Kingston upon Hull
title: 2013–14 Hull City A.F.C. season
